prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a sleek purple body and sharp, spiky features.
Imagine a fantastic poison-type creature that glimmers with shades of purple and pink.
Design a legendary Pokemon that can fly and has a unique serpentine body shape.
Generate an incredible Pokemon with an elegant, elongated design and vibrant color patterns.
Make a mythical beast with a captivating appearance, blending purple and pink hues.
Show me a powerful Pokemon that embodies speed and elegance, with sharp features and vivid colors.
Give me a dragon Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has stunning visual traits.
